name: Money Printer: Escape to the light
name_original: Money Printer: Escape to the light
description:
Please consider donating!

Description:

You are stuck in a 6:00 to 18:00 office job, printing money. Explore the office building, search for printer upgrades (batteries, upgrade chips) and find your way to the exit;

Duration: 

Around 30 minutes

Controls:

  • AWSD to walk around
  • Shift to sprint
  • Left mouse to open doors, pick up items and print.
  • Escape for menu

Installation:

Unzip the package and run the .exe file

Enjoy and please consider donating, leave a comment and share with your friends!

Check https://xtasestudios.itch.io/ for more games!
